sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.ROWNUM AS "ROWNUM", A.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD", A.EAISVCNAME AS "EAISVCNAME", A.SLOWTOTALCOUNT AS "SLOWTOTALCOUNT", A.SLOWCOUNT AS "SLOWCOUNT", COALESCE(B.EAISVCDESC, 'UNKNOWN') AS "EAISVCDESC" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM, A.EAIBZWKDSTCD, A.EAISVCNAME, COUNT(*) AS SLOWTOTALCOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR( TO_TIMESTAMP( SUBSTR ( (TO_TIMESTAMP(D.MSGPRCSSYMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS') - TO_TIMESTAMP(A.MSGDPSTYMS, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSMS')) , 12, 11 ) , 'HH24:MI:SS.MS') , 'HH24MISS.MS') >= 2.000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SLOWCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$ A , $schemaId$.$tableName$ B , $schemaId$.$tableName$ C , $schemaId$.$tableName$ D WHERE A.EAISVCSERNO = B.EAISVCSERNO AND A.EAISVCSERNO = C.EAISVCSERNO AND A.EAISVCSERNO = D.EAISVCSERNO AND A.LOGPRCSSSERNO = 100 AND B.LOGPRCSSSERNO = 200 AND C.LOGPRCSSSERNO = 300 AND D.LOGPRCSSSERNO = 400 AND A.MSGDPSTYMS >= #msgDpstYMS# ||'00000000000' AND A.MSGDPSTYMS <= #msgDpstYMS# ||'99999999999' AND A.LOGPRCSSSERNO != 900 AND SUBSTR(A.SVCMOTIVUSEDSTCD, 1, 1) = 'S' AND SUBSTR(A.PSVINTFACDSTICNAME, 1, 1) = 'S' GROUP BY A.EAIBZWKDSTCD, A.EAISVCNAME ORDER BY SLOWCOUNT DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 AND SLOWCOUNT > 0 ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 B ON A.EAISVCNAME = B.EAISVCNAME
